profile.author: Shawn Lee
profile.desc: Mr. Shawn Lee, BSc (Brand Management Executive) is committed to reaching out to more people on financial planning and helping them to achieve their life goals. Passionate about promoting financial literacy, Shawn was an Executive Committee Member of the Securities Investors Association (Singapore) Youth-Chapter (SIAS-YC), Hub Manager with the Citi-NIE Financial Literacy Hub for Teachers and the President of SIM Investment & Networking Club of 1,700 members. Shawn graduated with a Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Accounting & Finance Degree from the University of London International Programmes.
profile.title: Brand Management Executive
